Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.CLI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserInterface
    public class CLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_INTEGER_MISMATCH_MESSAGE
      String to be shown when user tries to input invalid character when expecting intgers
      private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_INVALID_EFFECT_CHOICE
      String to be shown when the user inputs an invalid effect choice for shoot
      private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_INVALID_INPUT_MESSAGE
      String to be shown when the user inputs an invalid choice
      private boolean isFrenzy
      true if the action called on the UI by the controller is on frenzy phase
      private java.lang.Object mapShowSync
      Object to synchronize System.out.println() with map, without interferences
      private java.lang.String playerName  
      private int previousDmg
      used to store a previous version of dmgs and marks, to check, when you receive a STATS update, if it has changed something from the previous version
      private int previousMarks
      used to store a previous version of dmgs and marks, to check, when you receive a STATS update, if it has changed something from the previous version
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.awt.Point> previousPos
      Map which links player ids with their previous position, currently initialized to -1, to check if the received STATS update has moved some player, and therefore show the change in the map
      private java.util.Scanner scanner
      default Scanner to get input from user
      private int validMove
      used to ask the server if the specified direction is valid (= no walls), since the cacheModel version doesn't store the cell adjacences we need to ask the server if a direction is valid or not
      private View view
      reference to the view linked to this UserInterface
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> wasOnline
      used to store a previous version of online status, to check if user is reconnecting or the stats updates are the same as before

      • previousPos

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.awt.Point> previousPos
        Map which links player ids with their previous position, currently initialized to -1, to check if the received STATS update has moved some player, and therefore show the change in the map

    • Method Detail

      • setValidMove

        public void setValidMove​(boolean validMove)
        Method useful for movements. First the client calls askMoveValid, with a single direction, the the server reply back to the client throught this setter, and it sets validMove to true if the direction is valid (no walls, nor out of map), otherwise false
        Specified by:
        setValidMove in interface UserInterface
        Parameters:
        validMove - boolean, true if direction is valid, false otherwise

        This function starts the ui and ask the user which protocol wants to use

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • notifyUpdate

        public void notifyUpdate​(UpdateType updateType,
                         int playerId,
                         TurnUpdate turnUpdate)
        Notify that a local client class has been updated inside the cachemodel
        Specified by:
        notifyUpdate in interface UserInterface
        Parameters:
        updateType - the class which has been updated
        playerId - useful in some case to determine which player has been updated (i.e. new position)
        turnUpdate - is the update class if the update is of type Turn

      • startAction

        public void startAction​(boolean isFrenzy,
                        boolean isBeforeFrenzyStarter)
        StartAction method, in which the user can choose between the game actions: move, move grab, shoot
        Specified by:
        startAction in interface UserInterface
        Parameters:
        isFrenzy - if is set to true start Frenzy methods, otherwise normal actions
        isBeforeFrenzyStarter - if true: current player is before frenzy starter, otherwise false

      • handleMove

        private java.util.List<Directions> handleMove​(int maxMoves)
        Handle a move request, asking to move to up to maxMoves, or stop before
        Parameters:
        maxMoves - max moves which can be done by the user
        Returns:
        a List of Directions with the choices of the user

      • startMove

        private void startMove​(int maxMoves,
                       boolean isFrenzyShoot)
        Handle a move action request
        Parameters:
        maxMoves - max number of moves
        isFrenzyShoot - true if in frenzy phase, false otherwise

      • startGrab

        private void startGrab​(int maxMoves)
        Handle a grab requests, note that grab is different between ammo cell and spawn cells, in the latter you can buy weapons
        Parameters:
        maxMoves - max number of moves which can be done before the grab action itself

      • handleWeaponGrab

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> handleWeaponGrab​(java.awt.Point pos)
        Handle weapons grab: if player has already 3 weapons he has to choose 1 to discard
        Parameters:
        pos - current spawn cell from where he wants to buy the weapon
        Returns:
        a List of String representing the name of the weapon to buy and, if needed, the one to discard

      • checkPayWithPowerUp

        private java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> checkPayWithPowerUp​(java.util.List<Color> cost,
                                                          java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUps,
                                                          java.util.List<Color> ammo)
        Parameters:
        cost - cost to be checked if payable with powerups
        powerUps - take powerups as parameter because you can remove some of them for partial cost checks
        ammo - take ammo as parameter because you can remove some of them for partial checks
        Returns:
        a list of CachedPowerUps to discard to pay the needed cost

      • checkPayWithPowerUp

        private java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> checkPayWithPowerUp​(java.util.List<Color> cost)
        Same as checkPayWithPowerUp but simpler version, which in case you don't need to specify local ammo and powerups will just read them from cacheModel and then call the main checkPayWithPowerUps method with them as parameters
        Parameters:
        cost - to be checked
        Returns:
        a list of CachedPowerUp to discard to pay the specified cost

      • hasPowerUpOfColor

        private boolean hasPowerUpOfColor​(java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUps,
                                  Color c)
        Parameters:
        powerUps - list of CachedPowerUps to be checked
        c - color to find
        Returns:
        true if the powerups list contains a powerup of the specified color, false otherwise

      • showCurrWeapons

        private void showCurrWeapons()
        Show the weapons which can be bought in spawn cells, with infos such as cost, reload cost, effects description

      • startShoot

        private void startShoot​(int maxMoves,
                        boolean isFrenzy)
        Handles a shoot action
        Parameters:
        maxMoves - max number of moves which can be done before shooting
        isFrenzy - true if the shoot is in frenzy phase, false otherwise

      • startFrenzyShootMove

        private void startFrenzyShootMove​(int maxMoves)
        Handles the move part in frenzy shoot
        Parameters:
        maxMoves - max number of moves before reload/shoot

      • handleScopeRequest

        private CachedPowerUp handleScopeRequest​(java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUps)
        Handles a targeting scope request after the user has chosen to shoot, if he has targeting scope
        Parameters:
        powerUps - list of powerups which contains targeting scope
        Returns:
        the targeting scope chosen to use

      • handleScopeTarget

        private int handleScopeTarget()
        Handle a targeting scope target request
        Returns:
        id of the player on whom the user wants to consume targeting scope

      • askCell

        private java.awt.Point askCell()
        Method to ask a cell from the map, used by both powerups or shoot effects
        Returns:
        a point representing the x and y coordinates of the cell chosen inside the map

      • askCell

        private java.awt.Point askCell​(CachedFullWeapon w,
                               int e)
        Handle a single askCell request per shoot effect
        Parameters:
        w - CachedFullWeapon if additional info about the weapon requests are needed
        e - number of the effect which askCell is hadling
        Returns:
        a point representing the x and y coordinates of the cell chosen inside the map

      • chooseTargets

        private java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> chooseTargets​(CachedFullWeapon w,
                                                                        int effectsNum)
        Helper method needed by startShoot to collect target/s to be shot
        Returns:
        a List of List of Integer representing the targets for each of the weapon effect (index 0: base effect, index 1: second effect, index 2: third effect)

      • chooseEffects

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> chooseEffects​(CachedFullWeapon w)
        Helper method to retrieve which weapon effect the player wants to use.
        Parameters:
        w - CachedFullWeapon chosen by the player to shoot (need it to read effect types/cost)
        Returns:
        a List of Integer representing which weapon effects the user wants to use

      • startReload

        public void startReload()
        Last turn phase, in which the user is asked if he wants to reload one or more of his weapons
        Specified by:
        startReload in interface UserInterface

      • canReload

        private boolean canReload​(java.lang.String weapon,
                          java.util.List<Color> ammoCubes,
                          java.util.List<CachedPowerUp> powerUps)
        Parameters:
        weapon - name of the weapon to be checked
        ammoCubes - list of ammocubes copied from cachemodel (can be modified by methods)
        powerUps - list of powerups copied from cachemodel (can be modified by methods, to track local changes)
        Returns:
        true if the weapon can be reloaded with current powerups and ammo, false otherwise

      • endGame

        public void endGame()
        This method will show the end game screen
        Specified by:
        endGame in interface UserInterface

      • calcKillShotTrackPoints

        private int calcKillShotTrackPoints​(int playerId)
        Parameters:
        playerId - id of the player to calc points
        Returns:
        the number of points done inside killShotTrack durig the game

      • showInfo

        private void showInfo()
        Show informations needed by the user to play his turn i.e. other players stats, weapons...

      • showWeapInSpawnCells

        private void showWeapInSpawnCells()
        Show info needed by the user to see which weapons are avaiable in spawn cells to be bought

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the UserInterface, after a timer of the current action phase expires
        Specified by:
        close in interface UserInterface
